thread.section_title: Bring Danmark Anmeldelser | Kundernes anmeldelser af Bring Danmark | www.bring.dk | 110 af 2002
thread.title: Michael Best
thread.title_full: Bring Danmark anmeldt af Michael Best

author: Michael Best
title: Michael Best
text:
The package was delivered to the wrong pickup location. I clearly specified, from the choices given, the location where I wanted to pick up my package, but my request was ignored.
Regarding your response, I did not specify 'a self-service machine' for delivery. I specifically chose to have the package left at a shop close to my home.
